pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to Your 'Revulytics' Data // Facilitates making a connection to the 'Revulytics' API and executing various queries. You can use it to get event data and metadata. The Revulytics documentation is available at https://docs.flexera.com/ui551/report/. This package is not supported by 'Flexera' (owner of the software).
